Bash(gh release create v2.4.46 --title "v2.4.46" --notes "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Changes

- **Context7 plugin approach**: Replaced MCP auto-registration with plugin + subagent isolation
  - Users now install context7 as a plugin: `/plugin marketplace add upstash/context7`
  - Subagent pattern prevents main context bloat during docs queries
  - Solves knowledge cutoff problem for long coding sessions

- **Updated skill documentation**: `context7-usage.md` now guides subagent-based usage

## Install / Update

```bash
npm install -g @su-record/vibe
vibe update
```

## Context7 Plugin Setup

```bash
/plugin marketplace add upstash/context7
/plugin install context7-plugin@context7-marketplace
```
EOF
\)")
Bash(powershell -Command "cd ''c:\\Users\\endba\\WorkSpace\\vibe''; npx tsc; ls dist/cli/ | Select-String post")
